title: The South Improvement Company Deal
summary: Rockefeller negotiated secret rebates with railroads to undercut competition and standardize oil shipments.
lesson: Control logistics infrastructure early to force smaller competitors into dependency.

title: The Cleveland Massacre (1872)
summary: He bought out 22 of 26 competing oil refineries in Cleveland in less than two months.
lesson: Strike fast and dominate fragmented markets with capital and leverage.
